detectors.description: DssExec.nextCastTime() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/eb/eb44d1Fa2DE0d6E4CcEA80dA982804ca3197005b_DssSpell.sol#141-166) uses a weak PRNG: "second = castTime % 60 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/eb/eb44d1Fa2DE0d6E4CcEA80dA982804ca3197005b_DssSpell.sol#149)"

DssExec.nextCastTime() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/eb/eb44d1Fa2DE0d6E4CcEA80dA982804ca3197005b_DssSpell.sol#141-166) uses a weak PRNG: "minute = castTime / 60 % 60 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/eb/eb44d1Fa2DE0d6E4CcEA80dA982804ca3197005b_DssSpell.sol#148)"

DssExec.nextCastTime() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/eb/eb44d1Fa2DE0d6E4CcEA80dA982804ca3197005b_DssSpell.sol#141-166) uses a weak PRNG: "hour = castTime / 3600 % 24 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/eb/eb44d1Fa2DE0d6E4CcEA80dA982804ca3197005b_DssSpell.sol#147)"
